Platform.Title: JCVI PFGRC Mycobacterium tuberculosis 22K v4 array designed primarily based on strain H37Rv
Platform.Manufacture-Protocol: 4QMT, with arrayer GENETIX, machine cycles 0, pen id 0, pen cycles 0, operator 0, humidity control 0, humidity set point0.000
Platform.Description: This set includes 4742 oligonucleotides, has 22176 spots distributed in 48 blocks.

Column.Name: Primary Target
Column.Description: Locus primarily hit by the oligo

Sample.Title: Replicate 1

Channel.Growth-Protocol: Cultures were grown in standard 7H9 broth media until a desired OD600 of 0.4-0.6 was reached.
Channel.Extract-Protocol: Total RNA was fixed by treating the samples with RNAlater,and later extracted using RNAbee (Tel-test Inc). Samples underwent phenol/chloroform extraction and isopropanol precipitation. For clean up, samples were DNAse treated and purified using an RNeasy Kit (Qiagen).
Channel.Label: Cy3
Channel.Label-Protocol: 8 ug of total RNA was primed with random decamers, then reverse transcribed for 2h at 50C using 400 U SuperScript III RTase (Invitrogen) in the presence of 10 mM each of dATP, dGTP, dTTP, 2 mM dCTP, and 1 mM Cy3/Cy5 dCTP.

Channel.Growth-Protocol: Cultures were grown in standard 7H9 broth media until a desired OD600 of 0.4-0.6 was reached.
Channel.Extract-Protocol: Total RNA was fixed by treating the samples with RNAlater,and later extracted using RNAbee (Tel-test Inc). Samples underwent phenol/chloroform extraction and isopropanol precipitation. For clean up, samples were DNAse treated and purified using an RNeasy Kit (Qiagen).
Channel.Label: Cy5
Channel.Label-Protocol: 8 ug of total RNA was primed with random decamers, then reverse transcribed for 2h at 50C using 400 U SuperScript III RTase (Invitrogen) in the presence of 10 mM each of dATP, dGTP, dTTP, 2 mM dCTP, and 1 mM Cy3/Cy5 dCTP.

Sample.Hybridization-Protocol: Hybridization buffer (5x SSC, 0.1% SDS, 50% formamide) was added, and samples were hybridized using a Tecan HS 400 Pro hybridization station. Slides were pre-hybridized (1% BSA, 0.1% SDS, 4x SSC) for 45min. Slides were washed sequentially using 2x SSC 0.1% SDS, 1x SSC, 0.2x SSC, and 0.05x SSC.
Sample.Scan-Protocol: Images were scanned using a GenePix 2500 scanner.
Sample.Description: Analysis used wild-type RNA as a control to compare against RNA obtained from pepD deletion strain
Sample.Data-Processing: Scanned images were processed and normalized using Scanalyze software. Data output was processed using MS Excel and SAM.

Series.Title: M. tuberculosis transcriptional profile of delta pepD strain vs wild-type strain
Series.Summary: pepD is regulated by a 2CS, MprAB, and impacts upon the regulation of sigE, an important M.tb sigma factor. Here we examine the global impact of gene regulation in a delta pepD mutant strain.
Series.Overall-Design: Analysis compares total RNA from early log growth cultures of both wild-type and a delta pepD strain.
